events.name: HACKAGONG Recruiters and Reps
events.about:
HackAGong has attracted the best technical talent the University of Wollongong and the Illawarra region has to offer. 56 designers, developers and business types are already registered and were expecting between 80-100 people for the 24-25 November weekend.

The hackathon event starts at 10am Saturday 24th November and runs continuously through to 4pm Sunday 25th November. From 4-6pm on Sunday 25th November, there is a presentation & awards event held at the uniBar where teams will pitch and demo their products, and judges will award prizes to the best.

This is an unparalled opportunity to see fresh recruiting talent in action, using the latest technologies and resources at hand, working within teams to build real-world product prototypes within just 30 hours.

Send your organisations representative to attend the main event, network, promote and chat to HackAGong participants. Food is provided for the entire weekend, and youre welcome to attend at any time during the weekend.

Well also include your company as a sponsor and add your logo to the website and marketing materials.

For more details: http://hackagong.com

events.name: HACKAGONG 2012
events.about:
Wollongongs first major hackathon open to all designers, developers and business folk.

  1. Form teams
  2. Devise an idea
  3. Build it in 48 hours
  4. Demo at a final event where the best win prizes!

Food will be provided for the entire weekend.

For more details, checkout the website: hackagong.com
